name: Chrono Conjurer
description:
Controls:

- Space

     -> hold = run

     -> double tap = dash

- Shift

     -> tap = slow enemies

     -> double tap = rewind

- Mouse position

     -> aim your attacks

A short survival arena game where you play as a wizard with the power to influence time.

Music by Ben Beardall.

This game was made for Mini Jam 112. The theme of the jam was "Chrono" and the limitation was "Only 3 Buttons."
